songs.title: Always in My Head (Live In Buenos Aires)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I think of you
I haven't slept
I think I do, but I don't forget
My body moves, goes where I will
But though I try, my heart stays still
It never moves, just won't be led
And so my mouth waters to be fed

[Chorus]
And you're always in my head
Always in my head
You're always in my head
You're always in my head, ayy
You're always in my head
Oh no, you're always in my
Always in my

[Outro]
This, I guess
Is to tell you you're chosen out from the rest
